data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

These reports are completed. http://uat.lawdata.co.za/reportcentral/

On Report Central under SearchWorks there is a new Report Type section called "Documents" which consist of the new Reports.

You may go ahead and test these reports with below example criteria.

CIPC                - Month='07', Year='2014'
Default Listing  - Month='07',Year='2013'
Demand Letter - Month='06',Year='2013'

@willemhuman
